name: Derelict Crossing
description:
Play as one of six differently aliens as you try to escape the derelict.

Play with the mouse, and you can use Y and N to continue forward as well as X and C to fight or dodge.

Made in Unity, Pyxel Edit, SFXR,  and Bosca Ceoil by me.

ToDo if I had more time:

  • Add a bossfight instead of just an anti-climactic ending, and there is a bug with the escaping once you reach the end.
  • Finetune and add flashy effects. Better portraits.
  • Add environmental backgrounds.
  • More loot and more encounters.
  • A lot of balancing.
